Description copied from interface: Gui
Set the scaling transform use to scale (and translate) the graphics context of the frame.

Specified by:
setFrameTransform in interface Gui
Parameters:
frame - The name of the frame.
virtualWidth - The virtual width of the frame.
virtualHeight - The virtual height of the frame.
offset - A diagonal offset (translation) measure as a percentage.
keepRatios - A flag indicating if the scaled display are must keep the aspect ratio.
